title: doc: /usr/local/go/bin not added to PATH with Mac package
body:
- Downloaded Go 1.4 .pkg from https://golang.org/dl/ for Mac OS X 10.10.1
- Clicked on the package to go through installation process
- Restarted all the Terminal sessions

Go was installed successfully in /usr/local/go, but /usr/local/go/bin was not added to PATH. This should have happened as mentioned at https://golang.org/doc/install#osx.
